data.title: ReFi Mexico
data.description: We are a 11 month old local ReFi node based in Mexico City. The first stage of our operations was to successfully start a community and onboard different talents along. This part is set and done, we have established ourselves as one of the more active Web 3.0 communities in Mexico, by having presence with multiple events and collaborating with local initiatives. Not only that, we attended a World-class hackathon and many members of our community won a prize, showing their talent and individual efforts done per each team, plus the interconnection and the power the ReFi Mexico community has. We have been fostering an ambient of growth and development, supporting local initiatives and entrepreneurs to empower themselves with Web 3.0 technologies and taking the ReFi concept beyond our big city.

Profiles or socials of other main team members publicly associated with the project:

https://www.linkedin.com/in/olahventures/

https://www.linkedin.com/in/gerardo-alvarez-nates/


Please explain how your project meets the Climate Solutions Round eligibility criteria.

Introduction:
We are a 11 month old local ReFi node based in Mexico City. The first stage of our operations was to successfully start a community and onboard different talents along. This part is set and done, we have established ourselves as one of the more active Web 3.0 communities in Mexico, by having presence with multiple events and collaborating with local initiatives. Not only that, we attended a World-class hackathon and many members of our community won a prize, showing their talent and individual efforts done per each team, plus the interconnection and the power the ReFi Mexico community has. We have been fostering an ambient of growth and development, supporting local initiatives and entrepreneurs to empower themselves with Web 3.0 technologies and taking the ReFi concept beyond our big city. 

[![IMG-1599.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/P5dzqw4B/IMG-1599.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/vcS6qDCz)

**7 ReFi winner projects in the whole hackathon, 5 are part of our community.**




Our proposal:
While originating interaction at the community level, we have designed an NFT Minter, allowing our system to evolve into an Impact Market Maker, swiftly adapting into the smart money paradigm shift from 'degens' to 'regens'. Our focus is to deliver tangible outcomes while onboarding impact driven communities and help them capture (impact) market capitalizations by design. This creates the natural conditions to tokenize any activity/asset which will hold and represent value of specific climate solutions, enabling specific market industries. Envisioning a future where we can redistribute, regenerate and design a globally interconnected and interdependent society. Bringing new growth opportunities to take down global south inequalities with the use of distributed ledger technologies and new self-sustainable business models along with complementary currencies and open source design.

[![Screen-Shot-2024-03-27-at-05-06-41.png](https://i.postimg.cc/76tQ3NBG/Screen-Shot-2024-03-27-at-05-06-41.png)](https://postimg.cc/k68c9WPq)

MockUp design and Wireframing


[![Screen-Shot-2024-03-27-at-05-06-58.png](https://i.postimg.cc/MGMDk8tT/Screen-Shot-2024-03-27-at-05-06-58.png)](https://postimg.cc/XZWFFmRS)
NFT Minter and Impact Market maker workflow



Frameworks: 
While this is a data driven proof of concept design. We integrate multiple frameworks, since this allows us to share a larger scope with world wide initiatives. In a simple but elegant manner, we use within our design the Economic Donut and Ecological Benefits Framework (EBF). In a way, to be able to share thought structures with bigger and more robust frameworks, which are in a way theoretical reductions for climate and social action. This helps us identify in a fractal structure 9 main planetary needs and 12 social needs, while adopting the EBF semantic structure. Literally obtaining a map to onboard local impact initiatives. 


[![Refi-NFT-minter.png](https://i.postimg.cc/vZZ4r7QY/Refi-NFT-minter.png)](https://postimg.cc/pp3VxFh4) 
**Our proposal is getting adopted by ReFiDAO** 





[![meet-up-1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/1Rj3XhKP/meet-up-1.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/Sjch1P5t)
Mexico City Community mappings 1


[![refi-near.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/ZnKcqg1h/refi-near.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/2bMvcHkH)
Mexico City Community mappings 2



State of the Art:
As leaders in the Web 3.0 ReFi space in Mexico, we have enabled community dynamics that helps us experiment with the NFT minter, before it‚Äôs an NFT minter, since we have mapped that our community is aiming to tokenize Real World Assets, specially natural products such as: coffee, rain water harvesting, amaranth, up-cycled clothing, cryptoreforestations and more. Therefore we experimented with a regenerative market, to create a real market maker (buyers-sellers) condition. We gathered local impact communities, for them to have product exposure, while we provided with Web 3.0 and crypto exposure, pushing adoption and inviting assistants to download their Wallet and push on-chain transactions, while maybe not being too successful, 15+ people left with wallets and knowing how to transact. Our next experiment is to plan another Regen Market, and this time, mint the products before and make seamless transactions, with chain abstraction. 


[![IMG-0717.png](https://i.postimg.cc/C1kcWVJ0/IMG-0717.png)](https://postimg.cc/N9G8HSWC)
Entrance to the Regen Market, our first experimental live marketplace. 



[![IMG-0719.png](https://i.postimg.cc/mk9LKj6J/IMG-0719.png)](https://postimg.cc/hQSRdLn1)
Local communities setting up shop: Amaranth and Kombucha


[![IMG-0718.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/8cXRn19t/IMG-0718.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/PvZvCktw)
Sorry for the bad picture. IRL Market, Upcycling clothing on the right, Kombucha in the middle and Amaranth on the left. 



[![IMG-0720.png](https://i.postimg.cc/QMDTm9Vj/IMG-0720.png)](https://postimg.cc/87ycPChY)
Excerpt taken from video: transacting with Bitcoin and Near in the IRL Market. We taught how to download a wallet in seconds and make transactions. It wasn‚Äôt such a successful activity as people were mostly relying on cash or debit cards. 


[![IMG-1058-1.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/4xg6LFSC/IMG-1058-1.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/tYBn7DbD)
Product showcase and Live demos. 



[![partners.png](https://i.postimg.cc/fLmWr5PF/partners.png)](https://postimg.cc/MMZ8c0qb)
Communities that participated with us that day, having live demos, product showcases, presentations and tech talks.


NFT Minter:
Integrating Web 3.0 technology goes beyond the code implementation to the Web page, specially when there is a full climate solution framework behind. At this point, we have a mock-up design and wireframing done. Not only that, we have worked on our tokenomics, introducing unique but also well known aspects in the economic space. We this NFT minter we are creating the conditions to fuel the classic formula y=x*z, which allows us to tokenize any type of activity/community/asset. We then help communities deploy their own attestation service based on EBF, and circular frameworks. We add endowments and liquidity pools to enable a regen data/metrics market maker. Tokenize Data and metrics - Creating a new way to socially capture economic value and innovate tokenomics in ReFi. We are creating the foundations of a Public Goods infrastructure with regenerative impact to make on-chain attestations to generate value from off-chain activities. This means a new way to add value to community tokens based on their impact. NFT Minter - Open and inclusive, all-in-one built-in NFT minter. This helps impact communities to capture economic value, and add a ‚Äúproof of work‚Äù as an dMRV, while enabling global collaborations. These are the pillars of the Impact Market Maker. Funding Mechanisms - Recognizing the importance of decentralized donation platforms, such as Gitcoin and Giveth to bootstrap the basics, we integrate other concepts, like endowments and liquidity pools to enable DeFi tools for the ReFi space (ReDeFining the future). R3G3N M3ntorship -   We push offline and Web 2 communities to adopt Web 3.0 technologies and regen habits/activities while integrating built-in frameworks (EBF, ED, E8) for more equitable distribution of humanity‚Äôs resources to help balance our complex planetary household through large scale cooperation in societies all around the globe starting in Mexico-Latam. Keep an eye on the memes of productions as hyperstructures (not as financial flash mobs). 

On the road to create the first Impact Market Maker:
We envision an Impact Market Maker as a tool to facilitate the trading of impact-driven data, while providing liquidity to that specific market/project/community and dMRV. So We first need to understand that the primary role of a traditional market maker ‚Äúis to enhance the efficiency and fluidity of the market by quoting both buy and sell prices for a financial instrument.‚Äù In a way, we introduce additional layers to the traditional Market Maker, seeking to add these principles to generate social/environmental impact storytellings (turning projects into their own oracle and pushing the dMRV narratives) alongside financial returns. This is how we ReDeFine a data-impact driven Market Maker. Carbon credits? Old fashion. Gamified Impact Market Maker as a meme of production of a hyperstructure is the future. 

[![2.png](https://i.postimg.cc/fyW4fKQY/2.png)](https://postimg.cc/LYW0HjXs)
Our roadmap for 2024


[![asesoria-refi.png](https://i.postimg.cc/T1K0xLrZ/asesoria-refi.png)](https://postimg.cc/fShmjbqK)
As well we are providing Office hours on ReFi Mexico Metaverse, to push projects implementing Web 3.0 tools from the design of their solutions. 




Conclusion:
In just 11 months, our local ReFi node in Mexico City has emerged as a dynamic force driving innovation and sustainability in the Web 3.0 landscape. With a strong community foundation and a track record of impactful collaborations, we are poised to revolutionize the market through our visionary proposal: the development of an NFT Minter to fuel an Impact Market Maker. By tokenizing real-world assets and activities, we're not just redefining market principles; we're reshaping the future. Through integration of frameworks like the Economic Donut and Ecological Benefits Framework, alongside collaboration with local organizations and adherence to ecological guidelines, we're forging a path towards a more equitable, regenerative, and interconnected society. Our vision transcends traditional market mechanisms, offering a bold, gamified approach to social and environmental impact, where carbon credits become antiquated relics of the past and the Impact Market Maker emerges as the beacon of a hyperstructural future.


[![R-evolucio-nm.png](https://i.postimg.cc/RhtPfJNw/R-evolucio-nm.png)](https://postimg.cc/ZvTFzRPq)




[![opevnt.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/MG8zj1Hm/opevnt.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/WdSBBFMd)


If you've received funding in past grant rounds, please share any new updates or milestones from the prior months. You can also include the challenges you've faced. 

How do you measure the impact of your project? Please provide examples and/or standard metrics. This might be used in future impact reports:

Certainly, the impact of our project is not confined to traditional metrics like carbon credits. Instead, we are pioneering a decentralized approach to measurement, reporting, and verification (MRV) that empowers our community to define and track its own metrics for success with professional guidance. By designing decentralized MRV systems, we are removing the reliance on single points of failure and placing decision-making power back into the hands of the community. For example, we are developing tools and frameworks that allow individuals and organizations to autonomously measure their contributions to sustainability, whether through carbon offsetting, biodiversity conservation, or social impact initiatives. These decentralized MRV mechanisms not only ensure greater transparency and trust but also enable more tailored and context-specific assessments of our project's impact. As we move away from antiquated models like carbon credits, we are paving the way for a more inclusive and resilient approach to measuring and maximizing our collective efforts towards building a regenerative and interconnected society.

Anything else you'd like to share about your project, previous work, or other project affiliations? Anything you'd like to add that may help in determining project eligibility?

It‚Äôs important to mention that we started the Regen Market initiative aligned with ecological guidelines, therefore we have collabed with local organization Angulo Ambiental, receiving both guidance on the process before and during the event, while receiving final feedback after the event as well. We compromise to make more and stronger collabs, to reduce the Web 3.0 events footprint, while providing top quality educational content in the space. 


[![4.png](https://i.postimg.cc/DZ4VjZSw/4.png)](https://postimg.cc/qhrZgpcP)
data.title: ReFi Mexico - Climate Action Marketplaceüå±

data.description:
HOLAüëãüèº BIENVENIDOS AMIGXS! üåÆ
refimexico.eth  /  refimexico.celo  /  refimexico.base 

Growing & educating everyone throughout all of Mexico about Regenerative Finance and Webüï∏Ô∏è3

Our application is focused on specific initiatives aimed to foster the growth of Web3,  and bring tanglible regenerative outcomes to the Mexico City. ü™Ö


As one of the largest metropolitan cities in the World, Mexico City confronts an array of challenges of monumental proportions. Yet, we possess both; the intellect and the motivation to achieve results.


MEXICO BY THE NUMBERS:

- Mexico Population: 133,002,352 people source
- Average age 27.5 years old source
- 3.5% of the population owns cryptocurrencies, projected to grow to 12% in 5 years (source)
- Digital Payment volume in 2023 projected to be $90 billion. By 2027 it is projected to reach $157 billion, double digit grow source 
- E-commerce market value $23 billion per year
- Mobile commerce market size $8 billion
- 2.2 million Digital Nomads in Mexico, 70% from USA. Mexico ranked 5th Digital Nomads destination nomadlist.com/mexico-city
- 80.8% of the population uses Internet Daily which 75% access with computer and 16% mobile (source)
- Mexico jumped in the crypto global rank from #47 to # 13 in countries owning crypto and will keep going
- 42% of Mexican companies are looking to adopt blockchain and cryptocurrencies in some form. source
- 51% of Internet users have used AI application
- Mexico City is 3 on the most popular cities for Digital Nomads 
- Mexico City is top 3 on Wi-Fi for Digital Nomads source
- Mexico is number 8th on global engineering graduates (between Ukraine and France)
Mexico Payments and E-commerce aims to grow at double digit pace
Source: https://medium.com/@bancambios/web3-adoption-in-mexico-at-all-time-high-take-a-look-4095b675a2aa


OUR PLAN

To grow the radius of a "Regenerative-Green Urban Sprawl" from the central part of the city called La Roma, reaching other parts of the city.

To make our "green foot-print"resonates in the surroundings of the City. We advocate for the integration of Regenerative Finance, Decentralized Finance, and Decentralized Social Media.


MANIFESTO
- Inclusivity is paramount
- Result-oriented pursuits govern our endeavors
- To materialize the growth of the community
- Foster Rregenerate at all levels
- The Planet comes first (no personal issues are allowed to stop ouor mission)


OUR ONLINE PRESENCE:
Learn more about us at: 
- refidao.com/community/local-?recordId=recPKGiAo38ks4BH5
- https://twitter.com/refimexico < Twitter
- https://www.linkedin.com/company/refimexico < LinkedIn
- https://instagram.com/refimexico < Instagram


LATEST NEWS ‚ú®
- We're thrilled to announce that we've been selected  by Ethereum Mexico to host the official ReFi event during the official Ethereum Mexico event where Vitalik Buterin himself will be attending in Octobre 21, 2023.
[![refi-pre-registro.png](https://i.postimg.cc/T3bZj7cq/refi-pre-registro.png)](https://postimg.cc/mPbXBSJt)


ACTION PLAN
After a meticulous Research & Development, we have curated realistic innitiatives to implement, and start the Regenerative Journey of others, and as well onboard new Users into Web3. 


- A Guide to have a Regenerative Lifestyle:
- Use Biodegradable Cleaning Products
- Consume from your local farmers
- Comsume from sustainable food suppliers
- Comsume only what you trule need
- Vertical Home garden/farm to grow food
- Build a Neighhood Netwotk to Swap veggies & fruits
- Clasify the residuals
- Avoid proceseses Foods
- Adoption of #MeatlessMonday 
- Accept only Eco-friendly Packaging 
- Reduce Petrol-consumtion
- Avoid Clotherrs made of Polyster & other Petrol-base material
- Buy clothes from brands who hire vulnerable communities
- Endorsement of Brands Supporting Vulnerable Communities
- Reject products culminating in Animal Cruelty 
- Use your Eco-Bicycle to more on short distances
- Measure your Carbon Footprint
- We will help the recollection of Plastic to do bricks or desks & chairs for Schools
- Open a ReFi Mexico Office or Hub
- Eco-friendly work-culture
- Become an evangelist
* We are working and communicating with projects collecting Organic Waste to produce BoiGas
* We are working and collaborating with projects collecting and shredding Plastic Waste and doin pyrolisis and bricks.


KPI & OKRs
- Onboard farmers  to Public Goos & Quadratic funding
- Set up a minimum of 10 new web2 and web3 communities to be onboarded into ReFi
- Empower and gather 10 new projects that were assisted with methodology development
- Onboard new rural communities integrated to our ecosystem
-  Set 20 new wallet a minimum active wallets in our community 
- Set up a minimum on 20 POAPs per month transactions within our community 
- Set 6 Twitter spaces per month
- Set up 10 new introductions to Analog  



DIRECTORY OF SUSTAINABLE RETAILERS:
- Upcoming, Stay Tuned through our Website

DIRECTORY OF ASSOCIATIONS AND WEB3 REFi ENTHUSIASTS:
- Upcoming, Stay Tuned through our Website


TEAM & MULTI-SIGNATURE 
* Guided by visionary leaders and fortified by contributors, ambassadors, and delegates.


[![Michelle-Speaker-Template-Night.png](https://i.postimg.cc/3JS16kJK/Michelle-Speaker-Template-Night.png)](https://postimg.cc/0bS7K2w3)
- Michelle, a chemical engineer and environmental engineer by profession, founder and managing partner at Senergy Tech. Her background is at the intersection at energy, environment, and technology who has worked at top Fortune 500 companies like Boeing, Intel, and ExxonMobil.




[![Oscar-Andrade-Speaker-Template-Night.png](https://i.postimg.cc/7LD5nV8b/Oscar-Andrade-Speaker-Template-Night.png)](https://postimg.cc/4YL4Jp3T)
- Oscar.zk, a co-founder of ReFi Starter, is the mastermind behind the Bancambios whitepaper of 2019. His vision heralds the replacement of toxic industrial business models with regenerative models, safeguarding nature and invoking regenerative business using Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT).




[![Gerardo-Alvarez-Speaker-Template-Night.png](https://i.postimg.cc/YS11p0kL/Gerardo-Alvarez-Speaker-Template-Night.png)](https://postimg.cc/94Q4bWDc)
- Gerardo Alvarez, a psychologist and social entrepreneur, is a co-founder of MotusDAO, his synergy with the Solar Punk community speaks volumes.


DISTINGUISHED DELEGATES & AVID COLLABORATORS:
- Mayeli
- Estefania
- Dorian
- Valentin
- Horacio
- Davide



PARTNERSHIPS & COLLABORATION
* * In the last months we have been connecting and networking with several organizations including:
- Asociacion de Agricultores Organicos
- Huerto Roma Verde
- Patagonia Mexico
- Coherentia
- Accion Climatica
- Angulo Ambiental
- Eco-Smart
- PetGas
- Casa Ronin
- EcoHub 3.8
- WUC (Web3 University Commmunity)
- Huerto Tlatelolco
- Instituto Mexicano de la Susteinabilidad
- Secretaria de Medio Ambiente
- Ayurveda Urbana
- 



INNOVATIVE WEB3 PRODUCTS ON THE HORIZON:

- We would love to have the support to build Web3 DApps, including a Regen-NFT Minter that resonates with the Regenerative Community we proudly nurture. 
- Regenerative Decentralized Marketplace with Eco-Friendly prodcuts aiming to reduce centralized dependancy.


REFI PROJECTS WITHIN OUR COMMUNITY

- Mayan Spirits
- CAP (on-chain impact accreditation)
- Healing Corals (Coral reforestation)
- Unite Earth (DeSoc)
- Amigos x El Planeta (social environmental initiatives)
- Motus DAO (decentralized healthcare)
- Eco Labmx (permaculture, organic agronomy, & clean energy)
- TLATOA (culture and art collaborations)
- Pluviam (water technology)
- SEIF (sustainable dao tooling)
- Vision Science Labs (medical privacy & health)
- Vital Temple (tokenized super food)
- Biogas production projects (sustainable energy)
- EcoBox (Recycle Management and trackability)
- Ecopina (Sports)
- FLOWY (Social Interactive App)
- Angulo Ambiental (non-profit helping the elder ones)
- Eco Roof (hardware climate technology)
- SEEDS (DeSci)
- Earthquake (ReSoc)
- Proyecto Mentesq (regenerative healing experiences)
- Innertechnologys (ReSci - mental health & human development)
- Dohka - Art for the Environment (minting collections)
- Neblin - (carbon credit project)
- Bancambios (Pay or trade & suppor the Planet)

DAOS:

Foster the use of impact DAOs within the Community to empower DAO tooling blockchain development.


COLLABORATIONS
- Ethereum Mexico
- Nouns
- Anti-SAT Web3 Community
- NFT community of Mexico City
- Polkadot Mexico
- Near Protocol Mexico,
- StarkNet Mexico
- Colledge (CELO)
- Algorand Mexico
- GEAR (Vara Neetowkr)
- Avalanche Mexico
- Avocado Blockchain
- Solana Mexico
- Solar Punks
- GreenPill Mexico


OUR REGENERATIVE COMMUNITY
- Humberto from Urnanika
- Ludin from Perennis Network
- Mayeli 
- Cotabe from Giveth
- Estefania Ferrera from TulumCoin
- Sandra & Piero - Huerto Roma Verde
 -Cyrus - Blockchain developer
- Anna P - Impact Plus
- SOX - GreenPill Community & Impact-GameFi Entrepreneur
- RoseGlz - Artist
- Horacio - Amigos x Planeta
- Davide - Mayan Spirits
- Ricardo - Web3 Developer
- Lesmo - Web3 Developer

PREVIOUS EVENTS
ReFi Event with Mayan Spirits, Nouns Mexico, PetGas, and ReFi Starter.
[![flyer-Embassy-Re-Fi-Mexico.png](https://i.postimg.cc/FzJJ9W8z/flyer-Embassy-Re-Fi-Mexico.png)](https://postimg.cc/Zv4qHcTz)

[![Re-Fi-Team-Mexico.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/wxbSZf9J/Re-Fi-Team-Mexico.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/pyzGnBhX)

Gerry at ReFi Mexico presentation
[![Gerry-Re-Fi-Mexico.png](https://i.postimg.cc/prZYN1Fj/Gerry-Re-Fi-Mexico.png)](https://postimg.cc/5QXFLgp9)

ReFi Mexico event in Puebla by MotusDAO
[![puebla-Re-Fi-Mexico.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/tgsjYKRX/puebla-Re-Fi-Mexico.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/gwb57B65)

[![Embassy-Re-Fi-Meetup.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/hPCPyWjB/Embassy-Re-Fi-Meetup.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/4m9gy0VL)

Audience at ReFi Mexico
[![Audience-Embassy-Re-Fi-Mx.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/CKMKmhCS/Audience-Embassy-Re-Fi-Mx.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/K1VFYysH)


Oscar giving a talk about ReFi on Web3 to students from 74 different technical universities in Mexico.
[![Re-Fi-Tlatxaca.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/jdD41SVr/Re-Fi-Tlatxaca.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/ZChNBZKf)


Dorian from Angulo Ambiental talking about how Education should be.
instagram.com/angulo_ambiental
[url=https://postimg.cc/jCMM4hZf][img]https://i.postimg.cc/jCMM4hZf/Dorian-Angulo-Ambiental.jpg[/img][/url]

Gerry at Huerto Roma Verda talking about ReFi & Web3
[![Whats-App-Image-2023-08-15-at-11-51-01-PM.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/ydR08TRP/Whats-App-Image-2023-08-15-at-11-51-01-PM.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/JD1sTZPD)


instagram.com/coherentia.ig Talking about how to reduce Personal Carbon Footprint
[![Coherentia.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/76L0gyjK/Coherentia.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/v1p4sCYn)


We are planing to onboard this Organic Farmers into Web3
[![Mercado-Farmers.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/Rhpmp2CC/Mercado-Farmers.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/hQmNfy7N)


Somo of the Local Associations also have interesting contests on Sustainability
[![EcoHub.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/bYkF67Jm/EcoHub.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/SjQrRtc9)


Plastic Waste transformed into Solid Plastic for long-term use like bricks.
[![plastic-waste.png](https://i.postimg.cc/c4yXwv4C/plastic-waste.png)](https://postimg.cc/fkCchTdQ)

Mayan Spirits & ArtBlocks Collab - announcement at ReFi Event with Nouns
[![Mayan-Spirits-Art-Blocks-announcement.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/ZYwjDJmF/Mayan-Spirits-Art-Blocks-announcement.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/w3sh1877)


GRATITUDE FOR YOUR INVALUABLE SUPPORT ON THIS REMARKABLE JOURNEY.


GRACIAS Y HASTA PRONTO!
üå±üí´ü´Ç

ACTION PLAN
After a meticulous Research & Development, we have curated realistic innitiatives to implement, and start the Regenerative Journey of others, and as well onboard new Users into Web3. 


- A Guide to have a Regenerative Lifestyle:
- Use Biodegradable Cleaning Products
- Consume from your local farmers
- Comsume from sustainable food suppliers
- Comsume only what you trule need
- Vertical Home garden/farm to grow food
- Build a Neighhood Netwotk to Swap veggies & fruits
- Clasify the residuals
- Avoid proceseses Foods
- Adoption of #MeatlessMonday 
- Accept only Eco-friendly Packaging 
- Reduce Petrol-consumtion
- Avoid Clotherrs made of Polyster & other Petrol-base material
- Buy clothes from brands who hire vulnerable communities
- Endorsement of Brands Supporting Vulnerable Communities
- Reject products culminating in Animal Cruelty 
- Use your Eco-Bicycle to more on short distances
- Measure your Carbon Footprint
- We will help the recollection of Plastic to do bricks or desks & chairs for Schools
- Open a ReFi Mexico Office or Hub
- Eco-friendly work-culture
- Become an evangelist
* We are working and communicating with projects collecting Organic Waste to produce BoiGas
* We are working and collaborating with projects collecting and shredding Plastic Waste and doin pyrolisis and bricks.


KPI & OKRs
- Onboard farmers  to Public Goos & Quadratic funding
- Set up a minimum of 10 new web2 and web3 communities to be onboarded into ReFi
- Empower and gather 10 new projects that were assisted with methodology development
- Onboard new rural communities integrated to our ecosystem
-  Set 20 new wallet a minimum active wallets in our community 
- Set up a minimum on 20 POAPs per month transactions within our community 
- Set 6 Twitter spaces per month
- Set up 10 new introductions to Analog  



DIRECTORY OF SUSTAINABLE RETAILERS:
- Upcoming, Stay Tuned through our Website

DIRECTORY OF ASSOCIATIONS AND WEB3 REFi ENTHUSIASTS:
- Upcoming, Stay Tuned through our Website


TEAM & MULTI-SIGNATURE 
* Guided by visionary leaders and fortified by contributors, ambassadors, and delegates.


[![Michelle-Speaker-Template-Night.png](https://i.postimg.cc/3JS16kJK/Michelle-Speaker-Template-Night.png)](https://postimg.cc/0bS7K2w3)
- Michelle, a chemical engineer and environmental engineer by profession, founder and managing partner at Senergy Tech. Her background is at the intersection at energy, environment, and technology who has worked at top Fortune 500 companies like Boeing, Intel, and ExxonMobil.




[![Oscar-Andrade-Speaker-Template-Night.png](https://i.postimg.cc/7LD5nV8b/Oscar-Andrade-Speaker-Template-Night.png)](https://postimg.cc/4YL4Jp3T)
- Oscar.zk, a co-founder of ReFi Starter, is the mastermind behind the Bancambios whitepaper of 2019. His vision heralds the replacement of toxic industrial business models with regenerative models, safeguarding nature and invoking regenerative business using Distributed Ledger Technology (DLT).




[![Gerardo-Alvarez-Speaker-Template-Night.png](https://i.postimg.cc/YS11p0kL/Gerardo-Alvarez-Speaker-Template-Night.png)](https://postimg.cc/94Q4bWDc)
- Gerardo Alvarez, a psychologist and social entrepreneur, is a co-founder of MotusDAO, his synergy with the Solar Punk community speaks volumes.

data.title: ReFi Mexico Local Node ‚ú®üå±
ReFi Mexico - Building a Regenerative Community NFT Impact Minter
data.description: The NFT Impact Minter is designed to introduce communities to blockchain technology by allowing them to tokenize their impact. This platform empowers individuals and projects to easly create and trade NFTs that represent their positive environmental, social, and economic activities. For the next phase, an impact marketplace will be established to serve as a financial inclusion tool, enabling users to sell their NFTs and access alternative funding. This initiative marks the beginning of a grassroots movement aimed at driving widespread adoption of Web 3.0 technologies powered by Celo.
data.problem: Many people are unaware of Web 3.0, regenerative practices, and the potential of blockchain technology brings as a financial inclusion tool. There is a significant adoption barrier due to the technical knowledge required. Impact communities struggle to find funding and face challenges in sustaining their efforts. Additionally, a large portion of the population is unbanked or underbanked, lacking proper financial guidance and often falling victim to scams when approaching the crypto space.
data.solution:
Our solution involves introducing Impact NFTs as utility tokens. By mapping impact communities and assisting them in tokenizing their impact in the simplest manner possible, we facilitate online transactions. Following this, we create an impact marketplace where users can sell their NFTs and start capitalizing on their efforts. This approach aims to increase transaction volumes on the protocol, bringing gamified tokenomics while demonstrating real use cases, and drive adoption by pushing the tokenization of Real-World Assets (RWA) backed by an impact market. Our documentation provides detailed guidance on both financial and educational aspects, addressing the needs of these communities comprehensively. We have also been extensively helping the Regen community grow, by bringing entrepreneurial guidance, serving as a ReFi hub where people interconnect, and promote Web 3.0 adoption, bringing builders into our community. 

Dive in to [refimexico.org/en](url) don't forget to explore our [mirror.xyz/refimexico.eth](url)
data.missionSummary: Our mission with the Regenerative Community NFT Impact Minter is to empower impact communities by introducing them to the transformative potential of blockchain technology. We aim to facilitate the tokenization of positive environmental, social, and economic activities, enabling communities to access alternative funding through an impact marketplace. By lowering the barriers to adoption and providing comprehensive financial and educational guidance, we strive to foster financial inclusion, drive the widespread adoption of Web 3.0 technologies powered by Celo, and support the growth of a thriving regenerative economy. Through entrepreneurial guidance and acting as a ReFi hub, we connect people, promote innovation, and build a robust community dedicated to sustainable development and real-world impact.

data.title: ReFi Mexico - Building an Impact DAO Framework
data.description: This year, ReFi Mexico is focused on creating the conditions for Impact DAOs to emerge across Mexico and LATAM, using regenerative principles as our north star. Our work centers on expanding the narrative, architecture, and activation models behind Impact Market Makers‚Äîa new class of on-chain infrastructure connecting community action with regenerative economic flows. We're advancing this by connecting the frontend and backend of our protocol, deploying the first smart contracts, and contributing to the Celo Mexican Peso mission as a catalyst for local, stable economic exchange. In parallel, we‚Äôre simplifying non-technical onboarding for grassroots groups, supporting their transition into tokenized impact measurement, and translating essential ‚ÄúHow to DAO‚Äù content to make decentralized coordination frameworks more accessible across the region.
data.problem: Across Mexico and Latin America, countless grassroots initiatives are generating real ecological, social, and economic impact‚Äîbut they remain disconnected from meaningful funding, governance tools, and digital infrastructure. Despite the rise of Web3, most communities lack accessible pathways to organize, measure their impact, and participate in regenerative economies. Meanwhile, existing funding systems are extractive, centralized, and often reward visibility over substance. Without localized frameworks, inclusive coordination models, and tools to link action to on-chain value, the regenerative movement remains fragmented and under-resourced.
data.solution: ReFi Mexico is building the foundations for a decentralized regenerative economy by designing and activating Impact DAOs‚Äîon-chain systems that connect real-world impact with digital value flows. Through a combination of protocol development, field-based experimentation, and cultural protocol stewardship, we enable local communities to form Impact DAOs, organize around shared goals, and access regenerative funding using blockchain tools. By translating "How to DAO" resources, supporting the launch of the Celo Mexican Peso, and simplifying non-technical onboarding, we‚Äôre creating an accessible, interoperable, and sovereign framework for regeneration to scale from the ground up.
data.missionSummary: ReFi Mexico exists to unlock the regenerative potential of communities across Mexico and LATAM by bridging grassroots action with Web3 infrastructure. Our mission is to empower local actors to coordinate transparently, access sustainable funding, and participate in decentralized regenerative economies through the creation of Impact DAOs and the development of inclusive, sovereign market tools like the Impact Market Maker.
data.pathToTake: Want to grow through just grant funding

questions.query: If applicable, describe how your project/community has been utilising or supporting the Celo ecosystem, or explain a roadmap for your plans to utilise, build with, or align with Celo.
questions.explanation:
### ReFi Mexico's Utilization and Support of the Celo Ecosystem

We have been working on an NFT minter that will evolve into a marketplace, with thoughtful documentation that contributes to the state of the art in tokenomics and framework design. We are developing and adapting a template for the regenerative community marketplace.

So far, we have onboarded several stakeholders, such as greenhouses, farmers, artists, and more, and we are mapping a network state of impact in Mexico. This will eventually become a full-fledged marketplace (e-commerce) for regenerative products and services. We are building and experimenting with concepts, actions, connecting channels, and regenerative literature to create a comprehensive platform for the community.

**Utilizing the Celo Ecosystem:**

- **NFT Minter and Marketplace:** Our evolving NFT minter and marketplace will be built on the Celo platform, leveraging its blockchain technology to ensure transparency, security, and scalability.
[![Re-Fi-minter-00001.png](https://i.postimg.cc/nrCbkcHk/Re-Fi-minter-00001.png)](https://postimg.cc/Fk5BFvkd)
[![Re-Fi-minter-00002.png](https://i.postimg.cc/50PWLFMy/Re-Fi-minter-00002.png)](https://postimg.cc/xJbZS88V)
[![Re-Fi-minter-00003.png](https://i.postimg.cc/HWhCL52P/Re-Fi-minter-00003.png)](https://postimg.cc/gr87Sx1v)
[![Re-Fi-minter-00004.png](https://i.postimg.cc/gjQ9BFjP/Re-Fi-minter-00004.png)](https://postimg.cc/Lgt0nWjy)

- **Tokenomics and Framework Design:** By contributing to the state of the art in tokenomics and framework design, we aim to set new standards for regenerative finance within the Celo ecosystem.
  - Read more here (don't forget to mint): [Mirror](https://mirror.xyz/refimexico.eth)
  - Check out our [White Paper](https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aTUaVFSvcLJ_LIiKt6X9Z7BQ7SIKJbzDLdpSoh6vdtc/edit)
  - Explore our [Github](https://github.com/ReFiMexico/NFT-Minter)
  - Karma: [Gap Karma](https://gap.karmahq.xyz/project/refi-mexico---building-a-regenerative-community-nft-impact-minter)
  - Don't forget to visit our [Web page](https://refimexico.org/en)

- **Stakeholder Onboarding:** We have successfully onboarded various stakeholders, including greenhouses, farmers, and artists, to our community, and they are ready to dive into the Celo ecosystem, facilitating their transition to blockchain-based solutions. We have also hosted 3 events featuring the Celo logo as a Quadratic Funding (QF) sponsor for previous Gitcoin rounds. We have experimented with organizing an IRL Marketplace that aligns with our project development and successfully collaborated with over 13 impact communities from different parts of Mexico and the world.
[![limpieza-cascada-foto-basura-AGBGX9-EKL4c7-P1-Pe.avif](https://i.postimg.cc/C1C0WbFc/limpieza-cascada-foto-basura-AGBGX9-EKL4c7-P1-Pe.avif)](https://postimg.cc/Q9Mv79K7)
[![winners-huatli.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/y6LDrC7H/winners-huatli.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/CdfMztZP)
[![ETHCincode-Mayo-Post-para-Instagram.png](https://i.postimg.cc/GpLcDRsM/ETHCincode-Mayo-Post-para-Instagram.png)](https://postimg.cc/fVPn46CX)
[![ETHCincode-Mayo-Post-para-Instagram-2.png](https://i.postimg.cc/C1MWhCQ5/ETHCincode-Mayo-Post-para-Instagram-2.png)](https://postimg.cc/p970kjxM)
[![X-Space.png](https://i.postimg.cc/d0jbcNng/X-Space.png)](https://postimg.cc/94z8Gp6B)
[![1.png](https://i.postimg.cc/zBfcZzyR/1.png)](https://postimg.cc/sBtc5R9V)

- **Network State Mapping:** Our efforts in mapping a network state of impact in Mexico City and beyond are aligned with Celo's mission of financial inclusion and sustainable development. These efforts will bring new users to Celo.
[![HCLM00003.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/ncK0nHpj/HCLM00003.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/Vd6jRPSm)
[![3071b103-b882-44c2-b258-12161e02ef9b.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/mDSxdRwq/3071b103-b882-44c2-b258-12161e02ef9b.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/G89S2W6J)
[![community-mapping.jpg](https://i.postimg.cc/L5LXTT4v/community-mapping.jpg)](https://postimg.cc/jnqtqy7J)

**Future Roadmap:**
- **Integration with Celo's DeFi Tools:** We plan to integrate Celo's decentralized finance (DeFi) tools to provide alternative funding mechanisms for local projects, enhancing financial inclusion and economic resilience.
- **Educational Initiatives:** Organizing workshops and events to educate the community about the benefits of Celo's blockchain technology and its applications in regenerative finance.
- **Collaboration and Partnerships:** Forming strategic partnerships within the Celo ecosystem to foster innovation and share resources, amplifying our impact on climate solutions.
- **Pilot Projects:** Implementing pilot projects that utilize Celo's blockchain for specific use cases, such as water harvesting systems and sustainable agriculture practices.
- **Grant Applications:** Actively seeking grants and funding opportunities within the Celo ecosystem to support the development and scaling of our initiatives.

By integrating with the Celo ecosystem, we aim to enhance our technological capabilities and increase community engagement, driving sustainable development through innovative and decentralized solutions.

data.name: Regen Coordination
data.description: The Regen Coordination Round is a proposal for a GG21 community round centered on the themes of Coordi-nations 3, Cosmo-localism 2, Bio-Regionalism 3, and Regenerative Finance (ReFi) 3. Bringing together GreenPill Network 1, ReFi DAO 1, Celo Regional DAOs 1 and Regens Unite 1, we aim to support a global movement of regenerative communities leveraging Web3 for real-world impact and addressing local needs. The round will feed into a program to support the further development of local community impact tracking methodologies, grant tooling interoperability, and integrated QF & RPGF. We have currently secured $60K in funding from Celo Public Goods, ReFi DAO and Greenpill and ask for Gitcoin‚Äôs backing as we embark on a shared mission to showcase how community coordination, Web3, and innovative financial mechanisms can enable ecological and social regeneration on a global scale.

Our work centers on expanding the narrative, architecture, and activation models behind Impact DAOs‚Äîa class of on-chain infrastructure connecting community action with regenerative economic flows. We're looking to deploy the first smart contracts of the IMM, while contributing to the Celo local stable coin currency adoption. In parallel, we‚Äôre simplifying non-technical onboarding for grassroots groups, supporting their transition into tokenized impact measurement, and translating essential ‚ÄúHow to DAO‚Äù content to make decentralized coordination frameworks more accessible across the region.

Our project was selected to be part of the [GG20 Celo Public Goods Climate Bonus Round](https://mirror.xyz/celopg.eth/McicejfzasLM0nD5HKNdPukgQHvVrRVT2GiFwwzf8AA).

### **Celo Claim:**

Your project has organised events and meetups that support the Celo ecosystem., Your project is actively developing a dApp to be deployed on the Celo Network.

https://twitter.com/ReFiMexico/status/1714092973346922701/photo/1

Side-event for Ethereum Mexico CELO awareness campaign

https://www.instagram.com/p/C2SUb2vsWsE/?img_index=5

Side Event for ETH CincodeMayo Regen Market CELO awareness campaign

https://twitter.com/ReFiMexico/status/1772412634467299679/photo/1

AngelHack Hackathon community presence

https://twitter.com/ReFiMexico/status/1730072144510439449/photo/1

EBF aligned

https://twitter.com/ReFiMexico/status/1716181930448679394/photo/1

ReFi Mexico (co-founder Gerry) on stage

Hypercerts:

https://hypercerts.org/app/view#claimId=0x822f17a9a5eecfd66dbaff7946a8071c265d1d07-18638626365727483397742880747467672014290944HyperCerts

Roadmap for CELO integration: 

Phase 1 (4-6 Weeks):

Mint NFTs with customizable data (impact area) on Celo.

Design user-friendly minting interface.

Test and deploy on Celo testnet.

Phase 2 (6-8 Weeks):

Integrate DEX functionality for NFT trading (cUSD pool).

Track impact via ReFi Mexico local node data.

Promote marketplace & impact within Celo & ReFi communities.

Phase 3 (Ongoing):

Implement secondary marketplace, staking, and governance.

Explore sustainable revenue models and partnerships.

Consider DAO transition for community-driven future.

data.name: Celo Public Goods
data.description: Celo is scaling Ethereum with real-world solutions, leading a thriving new digital economy for all

We are ReFi Mexico, local node dedicated to fostering regenerative finance and promoting the adoption of Web 3.0 technologies within local communities. Our mission is to create a sustainable and inclusive financial ecosystem by leveraging blockchain technology to drive positive environmental, social, and economic change.

The Impact NFT Minter -  designed to introduce communities to blockchain technology by allowing them to easily tokenize their impact. This dashboard will empower individuals and projects to create and trade NFTs that represent their positive environmental, social, and economic activities. It will serve as the interface where users can manage their NFTs, track their impact, and access the impact marketplace. This project marks the beginning of a grassroots movement aimed at driving widespread adoption of Web 3.0 technologies powered by Celo.

For more information into who we are and what we are building please visit [refimexico.org/en](url)
data.title: Celo GG20 Climate Bonus Round

questions.query: How should the success of your grant be measured?
questions.explanation:
-User engagement and satisfaction with the dashboard interface.
-Completion and functionality of the UX/UI design and mini pay integration.
-Positive feedback and testimonials from community members during testing phases.
-Readiness of the dashboard for the next phase of development and deployment.

questions.query: What is the intended direct impact your project will have on the ecosystem?
questions.explanation: The dashboard will provide a user-friendly and accessible entry point for communities to engage with blockchain technology and Web 3.0 tools. By simplifying the process of creating, managing, and trading NFTs, the dashboard will lower the barriers to adoption and empower more individuals and projects to participate in the digital economy. This will enhance financial inclusion, promote transparency, and support the growth of the regenerative finance movement powered by Celo.

questions.query: What is the long-term impact of your grant?
questions.explanation: In the long term, the NFT Minter dashboard will be a key enabler of a sustainable and regenerative economy. It will facilitate the tokenization and trading of impact-driven assets, supporting the development of real-world use cases for blockchain technology. By promoting the adoption of decentralized financial tools, the dashboard will drive the growth of a resilient and inclusive financial ecosystem. This project will also serve as a model for other communities, demonstrating the potential of blockchain technology to drive positive social and environmental change.

questions.query: How will the grant funds be used?
questions.explanation:
UX/UI Design: Creating a user-friendly interface that simplifies NFT management and trading.
User Research: Conducting user research to ensure the dashboard meets the needs of impact communities.
Design Prototyping and Testing: Developing design prototypes and conducting usability testing to refine the dashboard design.
Mini Pay Integration: Integrating mini pay functionality to facilitate seamless transactions.

questions.query: What is the timeframe for the work funded?
questions.explanation: The UX/UI design of the dashboard and mini pay integration will be completed within a 3-4 weeks timeframe. This includes user research, interface design, prototyping, testing, and finalizing the design.

questions.query: How will receiving a grant enable you to foster growth or innovation within the ecosystem?
questions.explanation: Receiving this grant will enable us to create a robust and intuitive dashboard that will significantly enhance user experience and engagement. The funds will be used specifically for the UX/UI design and the integration of Mini pay, ensuring the dashboard meets the needs of our diverse user base. By providing a seamless interface for managing NFTs and accessing the impact marketplace, the dashboard will drive innovation and adoption within the ecosystem.

data.text:
We have written a first draft for our whitepaper, where it explains what we want to do, and how we want to do it. 

We bring new inputs into regenerative tokenomics, as we mix old DeFi tools, with impact mesurement and more. 

We also find the way to map hyperstructures in a coordinate way following fundamental math theory. 

https://docs.google.com/document/d/1aTUaVFSvcLJ_LIiKt6X9Z7BQ7SIKJbzDLdpSoh6vdtc/edit?usp=sharing
